metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4002 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - high.
metadata.Description: [hugetlbfs: flush TLBs correctly after huge_pmd_unshare] Nadav Amit discovered that the hugetlb implementation in the Linux kernel did not perform TLB flushes under certain conditions. A local attacker could use this to leak or alter data from other processes that use huge pages.
